title: Engagement Enhancement Strategy Design for Student-Centered Mathematics Instruction

context.additional_context: Targets in-service elementary mathematics instructors in digital device-enabled environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three frameworks for enhancing learning engagement when designing student-centered lessons.
Learners can design activities using the Own-It, Learn-It, Share-It strategy in math lessons with at least 70% proficiency.
Learners can develop at least three personalized engagement strategies for individual students in large-classroom settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
